name: Growing plant
description:
The goal of this game is to grow plants for 9 days.

The manual comes out when you start the game.

The content is as follows.

Press the icon on the right to give the plant water and fertilizer.

Use icons to grow plants for a total of 9 days.

If you neglect water and fertilizer even for a day, the game is over.

If you add more water and fertilizer than you need per day, the game is over.

Then grow your plants beautifully!
